scripts.build-min: browserify src/main.js -s Syndicate -o dist/_syndicate.js && uglifyjs dist/_syndicate.js -o dist/syndicate.min.js && rm dist/_syndicate.js
scripts.build-compiler: browserify compiler/compiler.js -s SyndicateCompiler -o dist/_syndicatecompiler.js && uglifyjs dist/_syndicatecompiler.js -o dist/syndicatecompiler.min.js && rm dist/_syndicatecompiler.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min && npm run build-compiler
